title: Todoit Gnome extension
description: Todoit is a gnome shell extension, i built it to help me stay focused on my daily tasks

title: Clever Snake Game
description: A puzzle like web-based game, with levels that gets harder each time

title: Save useful links for later
description: lnk, is a CLI tool for saving useful links, the link title is scraped automatically.

title: Time slot picker
description: smooth, fully responsive and multi-language time slot picker reactjs component, that's used by 5+ projects by now.

title: Educative.io Courses Downloader
description: a python script with selenium that will download educative.io courses in pdf.

title: SearchGPT
description: A simple Chrome extension to start a conversation with chatGPT directly from your search bar.

title: Gorl
description: Redis-based rate limiter written in go

title: Simpleq
description: simple redis-based task queue for background processing, written in Go, I only built this project for learning how queues works

title: Migrator
description: pgx auto migrator, This is not ready for production, i started it because i wanted to have prisma like migration
